description: This is a description in English.

stepOne.description: Choose the group name, and later you will be able to share an invitation link with the people you want to add.
stepOne.groupName: What will the group be called?

cardEvent.title: Barbecue:
cardEvent.description: Barbecue bring whatever you want to drink

error.title: Oh no, traveler!
error.subtitle: Something has gone wrong on your journey!
error.message: We don't know how you got here, but we are working to guide you back.
error.help: Don't worry, we will help you find your way to your next destinations.

accessSection.title: Join the Adventure!
accessSection.description1: To start living this experience, you just need to enter the invitation code that has been shared with you.
accessSection.description2: This code will allow you to join a travel group where you can share with your companions, plan together, and enjoy unforgettable moments.
accessSection.description3: Don't miss out! Enter your code and start exploring new possibilities.

error.title: Oh no, traveler!
error.message: The code entered is incorrect, please enter it again.

confirm.title: Congratulations!
confirm.message: You have joined the travel group, now enjoy your vacation.

logout.title: Log Out
logout.message: Are you sure you want to log out?
